siteMode.name: Site Map
siteMode.help: Graphical map of all workspaces in the site.

siteMode.name: Workspaces in Site
siteMode.help: Lists all the workspaces that are in this site.

siteMode.name: Site Admin
siteMode.help: View and adjust the main settings for the site.

siteMode.name: Roles
siteMode.help: Role define who can do what within this site.

workMode.name: Front Page
workMode.help: Get the main overview of the workspace and recent changes

workMode.name: Meetings
workMode.help: List and manage all the meetings in this workspace

workMode.name: Topics
workMode.help: List and manage the discussions in the workspace.

workMode.name: Documents
workMode.help: List and access all the attached documents in the workspace.

workMode.name: Action Items
workMode.help: List and update all the action items in the workspace, current and historical

workMode.name: Decisions
workMode.help: Each workspace has a list of decisions that have been made over time.

workMode.name: Email
workMode.help: Email that has been sent by anyone about this workspace.

workMode.name: Labels
workMode.help: Create labels to help categorize documents, discussions, and action items.

workMode.name: Roles
workMode.help: Manage the roles that define who is able to what in this workspace

workMode.name: Admin
workMode.help: See and adjust all the settings for this workspace if you are in the administrator role

workMode.name: Personal
workMode.help: See your own settings that are unique to this workspace

workMode.name: Feedback
workMode.help: Tells us what you think about this page or what happened when you used it.

allModes.name: Training
allModes.help: Lots of videos on YouTube to help you learn how to use Weaver.
